messages.text:
Hello adg (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

Maybe cover should take the profile as an actual argument:

go tool cover -html prof.out

On 2013/06/21 19:12:50, rsc wrote:
> Maybe cover should take the profile as an actual argument:
> 
> go tool cover -html prof.out

I agree.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9c9a32a0c976&repo=tools ***

go.tools/cmd/cover: better usage message

R=adg, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10453044

Hello adg@golang.org, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

I vacillated on this topic, but this way the argument is only present
if we have a .go file. I like the clarity of that design, such as it
is.

-rob

subject: code review 10453044: go.tools/cmd/cover: better usage message
